  • Processes are important but can be uncommon, involving steps like negotiating leases or managing sales leads.
  • Order-to-cash represents a critical process involving order placement, payment collection, and related activities.
  • Process mining focuses on analyzing and understanding these processes to improve efficiency.
  • Task mining captures insights from desktop activity to understand business processes.
  • OCR and NLP are technologies used to collect desktop data for task mining.
  • Machine learning algorithms are employed to identify patterns in user actions and their impact on business outcomes.
